casebody.data:
No. -.

Thomas D. Thomas, Petitioner, v. South Butte Mining Company. Submitted June 8, 1914. Decided June 22, 1914. Mr. P. P. Wells for the petitioner.

Motion for'leave to file and prosecute petition for writ of certiorari to' the United States Circuit Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit in forma pauperis denied.
